Chinese.name: CDN日志转存S3
Chinese.description: 本示例演示了如何下载CDN的日志文件，使用流式分片的方式，存储到S3存储桶。该函数可以用于实现CDN日志定时存档等需求。
Chinese.attention: 必须指定环境变量 TARGET_S3_SECRET_ID、TARGET_S3_SECRET_KEY、TARGET_S3_REGION、TARGET_S3_BUCKET、TARGET_SCF_REGION; 可选环境变量 TARGET_S3_PATH TARGET_CDN_HOSTS

English.name: CDNSaveLogsIntoS3
English.description: Get logs by url and upload to S3 by streaming.
English.attention: Must assign environment variables:TARGET_S3_SECRET_ID、TARGET_S3_SECRET_KEY、TARGET_S3_REGION、TARGET_S3_BUCKET、TARGET_SCF_REGION; optional environment variables: TARGET_S3_PATH TARGET_CDN_HOSTS
